node.name: Hybrid Magnification Lens VR Headset MAKE: MIRACLE STUDIOS PVT LTD
node.description: 40mm size hybrid Fresnel lens, lightweight and 4mm thickness at the corner. Built-in Interpupillary distance adjustable feature to center the screen from the eye. Extra soft foam face cushioning so that the user can plug the headset for a longer time. Compatible with iOS, Android, and windows. (FOR PHONE SCREEN: 120x150mm / MATERIAL: Plastic & Foam)
node.content: 1> Comfortable for Redmi Note 10, Nokia C3, OPPO F19, and other similar phones having a similar screen size of 4.7x6 inches /2> Big size lenses provide expanded field of view, surpassing 100 degrees and offers a fully immersive viewing experience /3> For an HD vision, adjust the IPD to match face type, focal length adjustment knob allows users with nearsightedness or farsightedness to have eloquent viewing /4> Headband has firm head support that keeps the device in place even during head movement and activity /5> Sufficient room is provided to plug-in headphones externally, also earphones can easily be used with the headset.
node.alt: Procus ONE Virtual Reality Headset 40MM Lenses For IOS and Android Black

node.name: Hybrid Magnification Lens VR Headset MAKE: PROCUS
node.description: Closest to reality and immersion like no other, built-in headphones provide a theatrical experience. Touch button controller that can be used to help assist in controlling the device externally without having to remove the headset. Hybrid lenses reduce eye fatigue if the headset wears for longer periods of time. (FOR PHONE SCREEN: 120x150mm / MATERIAL: Plastic & Memory Foam)
node.content: 1> Comfortable for Redmi Note 10, Nokia C3, OPPO F19, and other similar phones having a similar screen size of 4.7x6 inches /2> Crystal clear acrylic lenses provide a large field of vision which is suitable for people within 0-800 degrees myopia, and 0-400 degree hypermetropia /3> Mobile holder panel to adjust the volume or preset the volume level before playing the movie /4> Mobile holder panel dissipates heat effectively so there is no problem of wear hot /5> High-quality soft memory foam for total noise cancellation over ears and also comfortable at long-term wearing /6> More than 1000 buyers recommend this VR headset with positive reviews.
node.alt: Procus PRO White Virtual Reality Headset  100120 Degree FOV with Highest Immersive Experience  Inbuilt Headphones

node.name: Singlet Magnification Lens VR Headset MAKE: SUPRICO
node.description: Shell structure for two Fresnel lenses which are lightweight, and inexpensive. Singlets lenses are thicker and curved that provide the clear magnifying picture in contrast to other conventional lenses. No battery needed and adjustable screen amplifier to relieve fatigue from eyes. (FOR PHONE SCREEN: 120x150mm / MATERIAL: Plastic & Silicone)
node.content: 1> Comfortable for Samsung Galaxy M31, Galaxy M12, Nokia 3.4, and other similar phones having a similar screen size of 4.7x6 inches /2> This VR headset comprises Fresnel lenses with a silicone sponge eye mask which is more comfortable, non-absorbent, and hygienic /3> T-shaped straps are adjusted to various head size, 10-year children to adults /4> Offer superior 3D picture effect and did not give any strain to eyes /5> Mobile heat is evacuated through vents so there is no problem of wear hot /6> Built-in earphones are not provided therefore the user has to connect earphones or headphones additionally /7> 2 years replacement warranty but not for damage or broken.
node.alt: Suprico 2021 Special New 3D HD Virtual Reality Headsets Virtual Reality Glasses 47 Inch to 65 inch for All Mobile Phones 1 Year Warranty

node.name: Resin Magnification Lens VR Headset MAKE: IRUSU TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD
node.description: Extra-wide 42mm size lens and soft couching eye masking for sweat resistance. Net weight is around 330 grams which are very light in weight and can be easily used for a long duration without any strain. Additional remote controller for navigation and gaming. High-level comfort with ABS plastic, strong build quality for low pressure on the face. (FOR PHONE SCREEN: 113x170mm / MATERIAL: ABS Plastic & Foam)
node.content: 1> Comfortable for Galaxy Note 4 & 3, Galaxy S6 Edge, iPhone 6 and other similar phones having a similar screen size of 4.5x6.69 inches /2> Best calibrated VR headset with extra-wide 42mm HD resin lenses /3> Provide focal adjustment on the mobile screen for a sharp image and also suitable for short eyesight, therefore, no need to wear glasses for short-sighted people within a range of 0-600 degrees /4> Remote controller is not compatible with iOS and Samsung galaxy series mobiles /5> Three-way adjustable head strap is adjusted to various head size, 10-year children to adults, foam face cushioning and the removable front panel provides excellent VR experience.
node.alt: Irusu Monster VR Headset with Remote Controller and Conductive Touch Button for VR Supported Smartphones New ModelBlack
